The aim study randomize clinical trial , double blind , splith-mouth , evaluate various type protocols clinical efficacy reduction even elimination dentinal hypersensitivity . A hundred forty teeth healthy patient sexes select . Visual Analog Scale use pain ( VAS ) measure intensity patient 's pain . The teeth randomly divide 7 different group accord desensitization treatment study : Desensibilize KF - FGM Dental Products , Clinpro - 3M Company , Minnesota - USA , Photon Laser III - DMC , Brazil , Desensibilize KF laser , Desensibilize KF Clinpro , laser Clinpro association product .
